long_description: You can drop it, toss it or soak it, but the Zippo Rugged LED lantern will keep on working throughout it all to ensure you have a bright light to illuminate your car-camping adventures. High-quality LED outputs 220 lumens on high; extra-long light tube with soft glow diffuser gives off pleasant light. Rubber corners cushion the blow from drops and everyday use-built to handle drops up to five feet; vertical stainless-steel tubes add durability. Built-in lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hrs. of use on high, 18 hrs. on medium and 59 hrs. on low. Includes a 120V AC wall charger for recharging the lithium-ion battery. Tote the lantern around and hang it up at camp with the flexible and detachable carry handle. The Zippo Rugged LED lantern floats in water and has an IPX7 water-resistance rating.
short_description: You can drop it, toss it or soak it, but the Zippo Rugged LED lantern will keep on working throughout it all to ensure you have a bright light to illuminate your car-camping adventures.
